title: July 30, 2010Part 2
content:
Today’s guest is Professor Amit Goswami and he is a theoretical nuclear physicist and a professor emeritus at the... <!--more--> University of Oregon’s Institute for Theoretical Physics.
He received his doctorate at the University of Calcutta in 1964 and has been teaching at Oregon since 1968.
He is a self-styled multidisciplinary quantum scientist, who applies the principles of physics to multiple research areas: the history of paradigm shifts, the New Biology and genetics, psychology and medicine and the healing arts.
His book the “Self Aware Universe” has been critically acclaimed among the major books addressing the correlation between quantum theory and consciousness.
